name: Twisted Forest
description:
3D platformer with some light combat. The initial gameplay takes place in a 2D overworld where you will go from level to level. Once you have entered a level the game transitions into 3D.  

I was the programmer for this specific project and we worked in a team of 4 to create this in a few months for a University project. 

Shaders and most of the particle effects were done by me as well.

Programmer:

Jake Norris 

ARTISTS:

2D - Ben Dywer, Briar Brunner

3D - Dawid Kraczewski
